name: Shahtzee!
description:
Your bullets are dice! Survive by shooting enemies while trying to get a high score by playing Yahtzee! 

How To Play

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Pause/Scorecard: Space

Shoot: Left Click

Pickup: E

- Shoot enemies to survive and roll your dice

- Play Yahtzee to score points (hit space to bring up score card)

- Your 5 dice is your ammo

- Pick the dice back up to reload and re-roll

- Most Yahtzee rules apply

Credits
